about_the_game:
In Holy Road, you play the role of an exiled bishop.

To reobtain what was rightfully yours, you must start all over from the very beginning.

You must start your kingdom, increase its population while defending your citizens, and thus increasing your wealth and power.

Only by doing this will you be able to get revenge on those that wronged you.

Do you have what it takes to build your kingdom from scratch?

Find out for yourself in this kingdom-building simulation game!

Features

    • A Kingdom Building Simulation Experience
    • Construct Buildings
    • Increase your Population
    • Defend your Citizens
    • Amass Wealth and Power
    • And Defeat your Enemies!

content_descriptors.notes: Holy Road features some partial nudity and some strong language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Protect your domain, develop and grow it, all while gaining wealth and power! Economically destroy everyone that stands in your way! Regain what was once yours and get your revenge in Holy Road!
